headline: Introducing Real World Serverless - Practical advice on how to use Cloudflare Workers

description: Weâ€™re getting the best minds on serverless technology from Cloudflare together to lead a series of talks on practical use cases for Cloudflare Workers. Join any of these six global talks for stories of how companies and developers are using serverless in the real world.
